name: kapvay
short_description:
Kapvay is an anti-hypertensive medication that serves a number of purposes such as side-effects related to stimulants, opioid detoxification, ADHD and neuropathic pain. FDA-approved this medication to treat children with ADHD aged 6-18. Generic name of this drug is chlonidine hydrochloride.
